welcome_message_body: Welcome to Navotas, Philippines! Get ready to experience the charm of our vibrant city known for its lively fishing industry and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Navotas has to offer.

restaurants.name: Judy Ann's Crispy Pata
restaurants.description: Judy Ann's Crispy Pata is a filipino restaurant located in Malabon.
restaurants.address: Gen. Luna Street, Malabon City, Rizal

restaurants.name: Balsa Sa Niugan
restaurants.description: Balsa Sa Niugan is a asian restaurant located in Malabon City.
restaurants.address: 3 M Aquino St, Niugan, Malabon City

restaurants.name: 9th Avenue Pares House
restaurants.description: 9th Avenue Pares House is a diner located in Caloocan City.

restaurants.name: Pares Retiro
restaurants.description: Pares Retiro is a filipino restaurant located in Quezon City.
restaurants.address: Retiro St, Quezon City, Quezon City

restaurants.name: ERSAO 二嫂
restaurants.description: ERSAO 二嫂 is a chinese restaurant located in Quezon City.
restaurants.address: 213 Banawe St, Brgy Manresa (at Mauban St), Quezon City, Quezon City

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it primarily serves international flights for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Formerly known as the Domestic Terminal, it now serves as a hub for low-cost carriers such as Cebu Pacific and AirAsia Philippines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baler Airport handles all domestic flights to and from Baler, Philippines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network while waiting for their flights.
